name: 悪島
message: "Hahahahahahaha!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Woah! Fuck!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "If we don't get down there fast, we're gonna be in deep shit!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "The plan's fucked. And Mink trusted us to get it done... Woah?!
It sounds like there's still more to Mink's plan. But first, we need to stop Akushima.
His megaphone takes a few seconds to recharge after each shot. Maybe I can use that time to control him.
My headache hasn't let up at all, so I'm not sure if I can even use Scrap.
But we're out of both options and time.
...Do or die.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll stop Akushima. You guys head down without me!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Huh? You crazy? How the fuck're you gonna stop him?!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "And what happened to Mink?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "He told me to head down with you guys!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "And you just did it?!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Come on, man... Mink wouldn't say something like that without good reason."

name: 悪島
message: "Hey! Hey! Heeey! What's the big DEAL?! Ready for another shooooot?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just leave this to me."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "...Fine. You better hurry up and get your ass down there too when you're done."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Fuck! What he said!"
After exchanging nods with Mink's guys, I shout at Akushima.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! I'm right here!"

name: 悪島
message: "Hehehe, have a nice, warm WELLCOOOOOOOOME!"
Akushima turns toward me, cheerfully brandishing his megaphone.
Mink was right. He is a persistent son of a bitch.
His persistence is at the root of this all.
So... I'll just have to destroy it.
Below me, the bike growls, as if it knows what I'm thinking.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Let's do this."

name: トリ
message: "Roger that."
Suddenly, Akushima finds himself staring into the maw of a charging motorcycle.

name: 悪島
message: "Huh?! Wh-Whaaat?!"
He has no time to react. I leap off just before we crash, and the impact knocks him to the ground.

name: 悪島
message: "Woah?!"
Before he can get up, I climb on top of him and stare into his eyes.
I focus my mind and desperately pray for success.
This is gonna work.<?>
It has to.
For the members of Mink's gang who put their trust in me... for Ren...
...for Mink.
I'm not doing this because someone asked me to. No one forced me into it.
This time, I'm using my power...
...of my own free will.
Akushima points his weapon at me. The muzzle begins to glow.
But I can't let that distract me.
Almost there...

name: 悪島
message: "Ahahahahaha, you really thought that'd work?! You sad sack of shit! Kiss your ass goodbyeeeeee!"
Now!

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Don't move."

name: 悪島
message: "Ahaahahahahahahaha... Ah?"

name: 悪島
message: "Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh??!?!!"
